shortDescription: The GraceMedia Media Player plugin 1.0 for WordPress allows Local File Inclusion via the "cfg" parameter.
vulnerabilityName: gracemedia_media_player_project gracemedia_media_player Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
